definition: to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex

sentences.english: An analytical method was developed to study the wave diffraction effects on V-type bottom-mounted breakwaters.
sentences.chinese: 給出了V形貫底式防波堤對波浪繞射計算的解析方法。

sentences.english: It makes the image of a subwavelength object magnified and breaks the diffraction limit.
sentences.chinese: 它讓物體的成像能突破繞射極限並具有放大效果。

sentences.english: The single and double diffractions have been considered.
sentences.chinese: 計算中考慮了一次和二次繞射。
